```{r}
#| echo: false

# Auto-generate masonry grid from folder
image_files <- list.files("../images/interior", full.names = TRUE, pattern = "\\.(jpg|jpeg|png|webp|gif)$")

for (img in image_files) {
  # Extract filename without extension for alt text
  filename <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(img))
  alt_text <- paste("Interior photography by Cristina Carrizosa -", filename)
  cat(sprintf('![%s](%s){.gallery-img loading="lazy" group="interior-gallery"}\n\n', alt_text, img))
}
```
